set.name: DMART-04 Fabulous Art: The Creation of Amazing Creatures ~The World of Shigenobu Matsumoto~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may cast this spell from your graveyard, If you do, after you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard.. ■Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it: ► Put a darkness creature that costs 4 or less or a darkness aura that costs 4 or less from your graveyard: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-04 Fabulous Art: The Creation of Amazing Creatures ~The World of Shigenobu Matsumoto~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may cast this spell from your mana zone. If you do, after you cast, put it on the bottom of your deck instead of your graveyard. ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped. ► Put a creature that costs 5 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone: ► One of your creatures gets +3000 power and can attack tapped or untapped creatures until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-04 Fabulous Art: The Creation of Amazing Creatures ~The World of Shigenobu Matsumoto~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand: ► One of your creatures gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn: ► Choose one of your creatures. At the end of that creature's first attack this turn, untap it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-04 Fabulous Art: The Creation of Amazing Creatures ~The World of Shigenobu Matsumoto~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Gravity Zero: If you have 7 or more Jokers in your mana zone and/or battle zone, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Choose a card that costs 3 or less and put it on the bottom of it’s owner’s deck. ► One of your creatures can attack your opponent until the end of the turn. ► Choose one of your opponent’s creatures. Ignore that creature’s effects until the end of the turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-04 Fabulous Art: The Creation of Amazing Creatures ~The World of Shigenobu Matsumoto~

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more spells in your graveyard, and this spell is in your shield zone, it has "shield trigger". ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Draw a card: ► Gacharange summon. ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-04 Fabulous Art: The Creation of Amazing Creatures ~The World of Shigenobu Matsumoto~

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Creature (This spell costs 1 less to play for each of your Creature in play. It can't cost less than 0.)} ■ Choose 2 of the following. (You may choose the same one twice.): ► Shieldify the top card of your deck: ► Put a non-evolution light creature that has "blocker" from your hand: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMART-04 Fabulous Art: The Creation of Amazing Creatures ~The World of Shigenobu Matsumoto~
